biography.summary: Kirsten E. Gillibrand is an American lawyer and politician serving as the junior United States Senator from New York since 2009. A Democrat, she previously represented New York's 20th congressional district in the House (2007â€“2009). Gillibrand has focused on issues including women's rights, healthcare, veterans' affairs, and national security.
